sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnworddicaryinfo ( WORD_ID /* */ , WORD_NM /* */ , ENG_NM /* */ , WORD_DC /* */ , SYNONM /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #wordId# /* */ , #wordNm# /* */ , #engNm# /* */ , #wordDc# /* */ , #synonm# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnworddicaryinfo SET WORD_ID=#wordId# /* */ , WORD_NM=#wordNm# /* */ , ENG_NM=#engNm# /* */ , WORD_DC=#wordDc# /* */ , SYNONM=#synonm# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE WORD_ID=#wordId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT WORD_ID /* */ , WORD_NM /* */ , ENG_NM /* */ , WORD_DC /* */ , SYNONM /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnworddicaryinfo WHERE WORD_ID=#wordId# /* */

SELECT WORD_ID /* */ , WORD_NM /* */ , ENG_NM /* */ , WORD_DC /* */ , SYNONM /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnworddicaryinfo WHERE 1=1
WORD_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY WORD_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnworddicaryinfo WHERE 1=1
WORD_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
